ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cvr1.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | cvr1.l | |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) |
| 3 |  | cvr1.j | |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) |
| 4 |  | cvr1.c | |- C = ( <o ` K ) |
| 5 |  | cvr1.a | |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 6 |  | #P_hlomcmcv | |- ( K e. HL -> ( K e. OML /\ K e. CLat /\ K e. CvLat ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_cvlcvr1 | |- ( ( ( K e. OML /\ K e. CLat /\ K e. CvLat ) /\ X e. B /\ P e. A ) -> ( -. P .<_ X <-> X C ( X .\/ P ) ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B /\ P e. A ) -> ( -. P .<_ X <-> X C ( X .\/ P ) ) ) |
